source:
raw_storage_container = 'n/a' + storage_account
raw_storage_source_folder = 'n/a'
raw_storage_source_name = 'n/a'
workspace_storage_container = 'abfss://odw-workspace@' + storage_account
workspace_storage_temp_folder = 'employee-syn'
workspace_storage_temp_name = 'employee-syn'
harmonised_storage_container = 'abfss://odw-harmonised@' + storage_account
harmonised_storage_delta_folder = 'inspector'
harmonised_storage_delta_table_name = 'inspector'
delta_lake_table_key_column = 'n/a'
delta_lake_table_name = "inspector"
delta_lake_database_name = "odw_harmonised_db"
sourceColumnNames = 'n/a'

# Import modules
from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, IntegerType, StringType ,DoubleType
from delta.tables import DeltaTable
harmonised_storage_delta_table_path = harmonised_storage_container + '/' + harmonised_storage_delta_folder + '/' + harmonised_storage_delta_table_name

harmonisedInspectorSchema = StructType([
    StructField("source_id", StringType(), True),\
    StructField("pins_staff_number", StringType(), False),\
    StructField("given_names", StringType(), False), \
    StructField("family_names", StringType(), False),\
    StructField("inspector_name", StringType(), False),\
    StructField("inspector_postcode", StringType(), False), \
    StructField("active_status", StringType(), False),\
    StructField("date_in", StringType(), False),\
    StructField("date_out", StringType(), False),\
    StructField("eo_responsible", StringType(), False),\
    StructField("grade", StringType(), False),\
    StructField("FTE", DoubleType(), False),\
    StructField("Inspector_Address", StringType(), False),\
    StructField("Telephone_no", StringType(), False),\
    StructField("Work_Mobile", StringType(), False),\
    StructField("is_sgl", IntegerType(), False),\
    StructField("pins_email_address", StringType(), False),\
    StructField("resource_code", StringType(), False),\
    StructField("emp_type", StringType(), False)
])

# create delta table 

if not (DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark,harmonised_storage_delta_table_path)):
    harmonisationInspectordf = spark.createDataFrame([], harmonisedInspectorSchema)
    harmonisationInspectordf.write.option("mergeSchema", "true").format('delta').mode('overwrite').save(harmonised_storage_delta_table_path)
    spark.sql("CREATE TABLE {0}.{1} USING DELTA LOCATION '{2}'".format(delta_lake_database_name,delta_lake_table_name,harmonised_storage_delta_table_path))

%%sql
merge into odw_harmonised_db.inspector target
using (SELECT 
case when inspector_raw.id is null then ROW_NUMBER() over (order by sap_hr.Pers_No,sap_hr.given_names,sap_hr.family_name) +1000000 
else inspector_raw.id end as source_id 
,sap_hr.pins_staff_number
,sap_hr.given_names
,sap_hr.family_name as family_names
,concat(sap_hr.given_names,' ',sap_hr.family_name) as inspector_name
,inspector_address.inspector_postcode as inspector_postcode
,sap_hr.active_status
,inspector_address.date_in
,inspector_address.date_out
,inspector_address.Charting_Officer_for_Inspector as eo_responsible
,sap_hr.PINS_join_grade as grade
,sap_hr.FTE as FTE
,inspector_address.Inspector_Address
,inspector_address.Telephone_no
,inspector_address.Work_Mobile
,sap_hr.is_sgl
,case when (sap_hr.Work_Contract = 'Non-Sal. Inspec' and sap_hr.active_status = 'ACTIVE') then 'nsi.planning@planninginspectorate.gov.uk'
      else coalesce(vw_sap_hr_email.email_address, vw_sap_hr_email_weekly.email_address ,sap_pins_email.Email_Address, NULL) 
 end as pins_email_address
,sap_hr.resource_code
,sap_hr.emp_type
 FROM 
 odw_workspace_db.sap_hr_layer1_harmonised sap_hr
 LEFT OUTER JOIN
 odw_workspace_db.inspector_address_layer1_harmonised inspector_address
 ON sap_hr.pins_staff_number = inspector_address.PINS_Join_staff_number
 LEFT OUTER JOIN
 odw_workspace_db.inspector_raw_layer1_harmonised inspector_raw
 ON sap_hr.pins_join_staff_number = inspector_raw.PINS_Join_staff_number
 and sap_hr.PINS_join_grade = inspector_raw.Grade
 LEFT OUTER JOIN
 odw_workspace_db.sap_pins_email_layer1_harmonised sap_pins_email
 ON sap_hr.PINS_Join_staff_number = sap_pins_email.Staff_Number
 LEFT OUTER JOIN
 odw_workspace_db.vw_sap_hr_email_layer1_harmonised vw_sap_hr_email
 ON sap_hr.pins_staff_number = vw_sap_hr_email.PINS_Join_staff_number 
 LEFT OUTER JOIN
 odw_workspace_db.vw_sap_hr_email_weekly_layer1_harmonised vw_sap_hr_email_weekly
 ON sap_hr.pins_staff_number = vw_sap_hr_email_weekly.PINS_Join_staff_number ) updates
on target.source_id=updates.source_id
WHEN MATCHED THEN
  UPDATE SET *
WHEN NOT MATCHED
  THEN INSERT *

#%%sql
##--select * from odw_workspace_db.sap_hr_layer1_harmonised sap_hr
#--select * from odw_workspace_db.inspector_address_layer1_harmonised inspector_address
#--select * from odw_workspace_db.inspector_raw_layer1_harmonised inspector_raw
#select * from odw_workspace_db.sap_pins_email_layer1_harmonised sap_pins_email
#--select * from  odw_workspace_db.vw_sap_hr_email_layer1_harmonised vw_sap_hr_email
#--select * from  odw_workspace_db.vw_sap_hr_email_weekly_layer1_harmonised vw_sap_hr_email_weekly
